mapper.insert: insert into eat( eat_user_id, eat_food_code, eat_food_name, eat_food_material ) values(#{eat_user_id}, #{eat_food_code}, #{eat_food_name}, #{eat_food_material})
mapper.select: select eat.eat_food_name from eat left outer join food on (eat.eat_food_code = food.food_code) where eat.eat_user_id = #{user_id} group by eat.eat_food_code order by count(eat.eat_food_code) desc
